title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your opportunities are more abundant than your obstacles now. But in your mind, the hindrances are the showstoppers which demand your immediate attention. However, look closely at whether a foe is really an adversary. Perhaps you have a misperception of them or they misunderstand your intentions. Similarly, a large task can seem gargantuan when you start. But if you flip your perspective and see the diamond waiting to be polished, you can achieve more than you realize. John Wanamaker wrote, One may walk over the highest mountain one step at a time. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
